description: Dell Secure Connect Gateway (SCG) Policy Manager, version(s) 5.20. 5.22, 5.24, 5.26, 5.28, contain(s) an Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability. An unauthenticated attacker with remote access could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to Script injection.

product.name: Secure Connect Gateway SCG Policy Manager
